snippet: The social media company had denied an emergency request from the New York Police Department three days ago after an account holder threatened mass murder at a Broadway theater.
abstract: Twitter officials comply with court order to turn over account information to help New York City Police Dept identify the person who has threatened to carry out an attack like the Colorado movie theater shooting at Broadway's Longacre Theater theater where Mike Tyson is appearing in one-man show Mike Tyson: Undisputed; compliance with the request came after Twitter officials were served with a subpoena three days after they first denied an emergency request fro the information.
lead_paragraph: The social media company had denied an emergency request from the New York Police Department three days ago after an account holder threatened mass murder at a Broadway theater.

headline.seo: After Delay, Twitter Sends Data on User Issuing Threats
headline.main: Court Prompts Twitter to Give Data to Police in Threat Case
headline.print_headline: Court Prompts Twitter to Give Data to Police In Threat Case
